channel.title: Posts on Elijah Gagne's site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Elijah Gagne's site

item.title: First Post
item.description: Welcome to the first post of my new blog. I have tried to blog a few times in the past, but have always fizzled out. It seems that an important question to ask is, “why blog?” A few reasons that come to mind off the cuff for me are: document things I learn to cement the concepts give myself a place to search and reference my notes share knowledge with others start a dialog with others to learn new things That all seems nice, but how am I going to keep this going?
